description: The commander-in-chief of Chess Piece army`s combat force and the strongest warrior of the Knight class (aka the Zodiac Knights). Phantom is a callous, sadistic individual who revels in bloodshed and destruction and, with his body rendered unkillable by the immortalizing power of the Zombie Tattoo, is one of the most fearsome beings to ever walked MÃ„R-Heaven. His overwhelming power and charisma makes him the object of fear and respect, in some cases even love, of many Chess Piece members.
name: Phantom
